tool_description: Access to the official french government business register via an API. Ideal for KYB
name: France Company Data
title: France Company Data

api_list.name: CompanySearchByID
api_list.description: Search by a french company's SIREN or SIRET number - for example 642050199
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://france-company-data.p.rapidapi.com/default/FR/siren/642050199"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "france-company-data.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://france-company-data.p.rapidapi.com/default/FR/siren/{id}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "france-company-data.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: CompanySearchByName
api_list.description:
Do a broad search against the french company register; for example, one can search by name by using the term;

denominationUniteLegale:google
